get.description: Get a list of summaries for sport events which are live right now. Sport events appear in the feed 10 minutes before the scheduled start time and are removed 10 minutes after the sport event is ended.
get.summary: get a list of summaries for live sport events

get.description: Get a list of timelines for sport events which are live right now. Sport events appear in the feed 10 minutes before the scheduled start time and are removed 10 minutes after the sport event is ended.
get.summary: get a list of timelines for live sport events

get.description: Get the summary and timelines for all sport events where something happened the last 10 seconds, with only the events of the last 10 seconds
get.summary: get the summary and timelines for all sport events where something happened the last 10 seconds, with only the events of the last 10 seconds

scout_abandoned.description: Scout has abandoned the match, no further updates.

text.example: Its a goal kick for the away team in Manchester.

form.description: Most recent match to the right

coverage.description: Describes the expected coverage for different entities within this type.  When type="sport_event" you will only get sport_event_properties.  When type="competition" you will get sport_event_properties and competition_properties. When type="group" you will get group_properties and sport_event_properties.

deeper_player_stats.description: Only available in the the extended soccer package.

deeper_team_stats.description: Only available in the the extended soccer package.

lineups_availability.description: Describes availability of lineups (pre match, post match)

enum_leader_list_type.description: the following types are for the extended package only: shots_on/off_target, goals_by_head/penalty, minutes_played

enum_sport_event_match_status.description: aet = After Extra Time, ap = After Penalties

statement.example: Italy scores 1.86 goals when playing at home and Ecuador scores 2 goals when playing away (on average).

card_description.description: describes if card was obtained pre/after match, on bench, during penalty etc.

multiple_competitors.description: True if the player has played for multiple competitors in the season in question

X-Offset.description: Number of competitor mappings skipped before collecting current result set.

X-Result.description: Number of competitor mappings returned for current request.

X-Offset.description: Number of player mappings skipped before collecting current result set.

X-Result.description: Number of player mappings returned for current request.

X-Max-Results.description: Total number of sport events for requested date.

X-Offset.description: Number of sport events skipped before collecting current result set.

X-Result.description: Number of sport events returned for current request.

X-Offset.description: Number of competitors skipped before collecting current result set.

X-Result.description: Number of competitors returned for current request.

X-Max-Results.description: Total number of competitors in requested season.

X-Result.description: Number of competitors returned for current request.

X-Max-Results.description: Total number of players in requested season.

X-Offset.description: Number of players skipped before collecting current result set.

X-Result.description: Number of players returned for current request.

X-Max-Results.description: Total number of sport events in requested season.

X-Offset.description: Number of sport events skipped before collecting current result set.

X-Max-Results.description: Total number of created sport events.

X-Offset.description: Number of created sport events skipped before collecting current result set.

X-Max-Results.description: Total number of updated sport events.

created_endpoints_limit.description: The numbers of items to return. Default: 200
created_endpoints_limit.name: limit

limit.description: The numbers of items to return. Maximum: 200
limit.name: limit

offset.description: The number of items to skip before starting to collect the result set. Default: 0
offset.name: offset

round.description: Standings for specified round number. If the round number is not specified, last round is displayed by default.
round.name: round

start.description: The number of items to skip before starting to collect the result set. Default: 0
start.name: start

stream_event_id.description: Type of event, i.e. point, separated by comma
stream_event_id.name: event_id

stream_sport_event_id.description: Sport Event URNs (sr:match:x), separated by comma
stream_sport_event_id.name: sport_event_id

updated_removed_endpoints_limit.description: The numbers of items to return. Default: 200
updated_removed_endpoints_limit.name: limit
